Description.Text: London City apartments offer a comfortable, stylish and conveniently located accommodation ranging from 1 & 2 bedroom apartments to magnificent 3 bedroom penthouse apartment which boasts impressive views of the city. The apartments are extremely well equipped and well designed to be a home away from home. With fully equipped kitchens, high tech appliances (including ipod dock), spacious living area, balcony and under-floor heating in each apartment.

The property is located a short walk from Barbican Underground Station and the local area provides a broad selection of bars, restaurants, shops and supermarkets. St Pauls Catherdal is 15-20 minute walk with easy access to the tourist area on the South-bank.

Luxury 1 bedroom apartment - Luxury 1 bedroom apartment with one double bed includes designed to be a home from home with open plan lounge/dining/kitchen. Full Kitchen facility. One double bedroom and bathroom with shower over bath. Balcony and under-floor heating.
Luxury 2 bedroom apartment - Luxury 2 bedroom apartment with two double beds includes designed to be a home from home. With open plan lounge/dining/kitchen. Full kitchen facility. 2 double bedrooms, master bedroom with en suite shower and separate bathroom (with shower over bath)
Two Bedroom Penthouse Apartment - Luxury 2 bedroom penthouse apartment, designed to be a home from home. With open plan lounge/dining/kitchen. Full kitchen facility. 2 double bedrooms and bathroom with shower over bath. Balcony and under-floor heating.
Three Bedroom Penthouse Apartment - Luxury 3 bedroom penthouse apartment, designed to be a home from home. With open plan lounge/dining/kitchen. Full kitchen facility. 3 double bedrooms master en suite and bathroom with shower over bath. Balcony, city views and under-floor heating.
